<title
    level="1"
    right="Feat 18"
    pfs=""
>
[Master Snowcasting](/Feats.aspx?ID=4104) <actions string="" />
</title>

<traits>
<trait label="Archetype" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=12" />
</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

**Source** [Treasure Vault](/Sources.aspx?ID=191) pg. 185 <sup>2.0</sup>

**Archetype** [Gelid Shard](/Archetypes.aspx?ID=201)

</column>

---

You have unlocked the deeper magic of your _gelid shard_, gaining access to new levels of spells. You gain the [master spellcasting benefits](/Rules.aspx?ID=170).
name: Master Snowcasting
